submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        left = 0
        right = n - 1
        count = defaultdict(int)
        total = n // 2
        while left < right:
            count[abs(nums[left] - nums[right])] += 1
            left += 1
            right -= 1
        # 遍历每种abs的值
        ans = float('inf')
        for x in count.keys():
            cnt = 0
            i = 0
            j = n -1
            # 最少修改次数都大于ans
            if total - count[x] >= ans:
                continue
            while i < j:
                if abs(nums[i] - nums[j]) == x:
                    i += 1
                    j -= 1
                    continue
                else:
                    if k - min(nums[i], nums[j]) < x and max(nums[i], nums[j]) < x:
                        cnt += 2
                    else:
                        cnt += 1
                i += 1
                j -= 1
            ans = min(ans, cnt)
        return ans
# [0,1,2,3,3,6,5,4], k = 6
# [9,2,7,7,8,9,1,5,1,9,4,9,4,7]
# 9  正确答案 4  输出了 5
            
# [5,14,0,4,1,1,7,14,7,13,16,14,6,6,13,11] 16
# 预期 5 输出6
